shippingInfo:
All orders are shipped with our partners Fedex and DHL.

Flat rate shipping of $10 to the United States of America.

Expected delivery times of 3-5 business days. Prescription eyeglasses need an extra 3 days for fitting at our partner labs.

glassFeatures.title: Thin and light lenses as per your prescription

Blue Light Filter.description: Can help reduce visual fatigue from excessive screen use
Blue Light Filter.title: Blue Light Filter

Non-Prescription.description: Clear, hard-coated lenses ready to wear.
Non-Prescription.title: Non-Prescription

Prescription.description: Single-vision lenses for distance or near vision
Prescription.title: Prescription

Standard Lenses.description: Our lenses come standard with water repellent, anti-reflective, and scratch resistant coatings
Standard Lenses.title: Standard Lenses

Blue Light Filter + Photochromic.description: Reduce visual fatigue from excessive screen use  react quickly to changing light conditions
Blue Light Filter + Photochromic.title: Blue Light Filter + Photochromic

Photochromic.description: The lens will react quickly to changing light conditions, darkening outside or in bright sunlight
Photochromic.title: Photochromic

Tinted.description: Add a tint for a high-contrast vision experience, even in glare or diffused lighting
Tinted.title: Tinted

Progressive.description: No-line lenses with three fields of vision: distance, intermediate, and near
Progressive.title: Progressive

Single vision.description: Most common prescription lenses, used for either distance or near vision
Single vision.title: Single Vision

Bifocal.description: Lenses with two fields of vision (distance and near) separated by a visible line.
Bifocal.title: Bifocal

content.title: Prescription (Single Vision)
content.description: Single Vision lenses are the standard eyeglass prescription. These glasses are for one field of vision across the entire lens. Single vision glasses can be prescribed for distance vision or near-vision reading glasses

content.title: Reading Glasses
content.description: Reading Glasses offer simple magnification to help you see objects nearby. These glasses come in generic strengths to improve the wearer's vision when reading.

content.title: Non-Prescription
content.description: These glasses do not come with powered lenses. They include standard hard coated lenses that offer no vision correction
